summary: A patch to fix the conversations in the mod 'Alternate Start - Live Another Life', seeing as you weren't at Helgen when it was burned down.
descriptionHtml:
A patch to fix the conversations in the mod 'Alternate Start - Live Another Life' by Arthmoor(http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/?). It will probably run with other alternate start type mods, but this is the one it was specifically designed for.
I made this because you weren't at Helgen when it was burned down, and the conversations act like you were.
Currently fixes the conversation with Jarl Balgruuf after warning him about the dragon, and the conversations when joining the Imperials and the Stormcloaks.
Only fixes the text conversations, not the voices.

For feedback, although I will occasionally check on here, I will respond faster if you put your feedback here on my website: http://f1repl4ce.enjin.com/forum/m/19328304/viewthread/13533056-live-another-life-conversations-patch/page/1







Note to the admins or whoever: If I am breaking any rules by uploading this(I don't think I am), I apologize. Rather than a ban, if you notify me of the rule broken, I will fix the issue.
author: F1repl4ce
